My name is Jon Walz and I am Northwest Native. I hail from the small town of Eugene Oregon and currently live in the beautiful city of Portland Oregon. I have been a web developer since 2014 and I love specialty coffee and have a love for all things coffee.

email: jon.walz.music@gmail.com
